snippet.title: Alien Life Simulator Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist it! ❤️https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478310/Alien_Life_Simulator/

Alien Life Simulator is an action adventure game with roguelike and survival game inspired mechanics. You explore alien worlds and fight hostile aliens with engaging third person shooting. Manage the emotions of your alien to get buffs and avoid debuffs. Build relationships with other aliens and keep in mind that your emotions effect your relationships with aliens around you.
